trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: 프린터에 정보를 전송 하는 인쇄 컨트롤러를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>이 클래스를 사용합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄에 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>네임 스페이스 개요.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: 시기 및 문서의 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage 직후에 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 예외가 throw 되는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage가 호출 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>프린터로 보낼 개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체 단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage 메서드는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체를 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OnEndPage is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> is required.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage의 인쇄 컨텍스트에서 호출 될 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>의 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>가 필요 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 프린터로 인쇄 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> 필요

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>
trans-unit.target: 이 방법을 사용 하려면 다른 모든 호출을 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>의 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> 문서에서 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: 네이티브 Win32 응용 프로그램 프로그래밍 인터페이스 (API) 페이지에 쓰기를 완료 하지 못했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: 시기 및 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint 직후 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 중 확인할 수 없는 예외가 throw 되었으면 하는 경우에 OnEndPrint 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>프린터로 보낼 개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체 단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>OnEndPrint 메서드는 개체의 할당을 취소 하는 동안 개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: 네이티브 Win32 응용 프로그램 프로그래밍 인터페이스 (API)에서 인쇄 작업을 완료 하지 못했습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: -또는-네이티브 Win32 API에 지정된 된 디바이스 컨텍스트 (DC) 삭제할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: 시기 및 문서에서 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage 바로 전에 호출 됩니다 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄에 사용 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 OnStartPage 메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체 단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> 문서에서 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 이 매개 변수 속성이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the OnStartPage method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하 OnStartPage 메서드에서 반환 된 값이 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 에서 페이지를 나타내는 개체는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: 네이티브 Win32 응용 프로그램 프로그래밍 인터페이스 (API) 데이터를 허용 하도록 프린터 드라이버를 준비할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: -또는-네이티브 Win32 API에는 지정한 프린터 또는 플로터 DC (디바이스 컨텍스트) 지정 된 정보를 사용 하 여 업데이트할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: 시기 및 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 직후 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄에 사용 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 호출 되 면는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체 단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint은 프린터 설정이 올바른지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 프린터 설정을 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: 네이티브 Win32 응용 프로그램 프로그래밍 인터페이스 (API)에서 인쇄 작업을 시작 하지 못했습니다.
